channel.title: Project Equinox (Needs A Development Team)
channel.description:
[center][center][center][center][IMG]http://i1070.photobucket.com/albums/u482/dev_ezzi/RSPS%20backs/cooltext6369600801.png[/img][/center] I am starting a project I am calling it Project Equinox, this is based of Sanity's release of Project insanity so it is practically blank I plan on making it one of the best servers to be released or played, but I know I can't do it alone, so I need a team you can contact me here: Windows Live Messenger: estamiezzii@hotmail.com Skype: joseph.wilkins4 [center][size=14pt]Got all the spots for team except a GFX designer.[/size][/center][/s] [center][size=12pt]Switched Client Still PI though..[/size][/center] [center][size=10pt]Updates[/size][/center] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/9gviip.png[/img] [QUOTE] UPDATES as of: 2/16/12 Added Gnome agility Some commands it had only 3 Fixed T1 errors Fixed some items that required 10defence but only needed 1 Adding correct teleports for ancient spellbook and modern Finished Barb Agility Moved home to varrock Made an NPC that takes you around the server. [/QUOTE] [QUOTE] UPDATES as of 12:20pm 2/17/12 Enabled Firemaking Rewrote woodcutting [/QUOTE] [QUOTE] Fixed teleporting Npc Fixed edgeville trapdoor and ladder Added and spawned shops and npc's Started Tutorial Island base. Wrote dialogues for the survival expert. Added a reward for finishing survival expert. Started a bread making base. Finished bread making. Added The correct emotes when cooking on a range. [/QUOTE] [QUOTE] Added cooking on a fire for beef:L Added Master Chef to tutorial island. Added Combat Instructor to Tutorial Island. Added Mining Instructor to Tutorial Island. [/QUOTE] [center][size=24pt]Here' what's already in[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/amjog.png[/img][/center] [center]Basic Range Basic Melee Basic Magic Auto casting Perfect Switching7 [/center] [size=18pt][center]Skills[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/mttffn.png[/img][/center] [center]All trees Work Stumps[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/dos4n7.png[/img][/center] [center]Get fish[/center] [center]Correct anims[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/5ugze8.png[/img][/center] [center]Gnome agility[/center] [center]Barbarian Agility[/center] [center]Ape atoll agility[/center] [center]Werewolf agility[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2cqe6go.png[/img][/center] [center]Stall thieving[/center] [center]Npc Thieving[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/27ycnpi.png[/img][/center] [center]Burying bones[/center] [center]Use on altar[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/aws6k1.jpg[/img][/center] [center]Normal Spell book[/center] [center]Ancient Spell book[/center] [center]Lunar Spell book[/center] [center]Auto casting[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/mbstgh.png[/img][/center] [center]Tinderbox with logs[/center] [center]Clipped[/center] [center]Fire Shows.[/center]
[font=impact][size=18pt]Finished a working tutorial island :D[/size][/font][/center][/center]

item.title: Project Equinox (Needs A Development Team)
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

Loveandpower:

um…I like the banner? <3

ermm… Thanks I didn’t make it a website did… But I’m starting my way into gfx design. :P[quote=“arham 4, post:14, topic:433210”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=535928.msg3919072#msg3919072 date=1329518134]

More info, stop putting like a big clob of text in the intro, make the topic better, and so…

Good luck!

Why do you care so much about the topic,
it’s what he does that counts
[/quote]
It gives me a first eyed view of the development. How he feels about it and so…
Any ways, as I stated before, good luck (permagood luck :D).[/quote]
Once again thanks

Read full topic

item.description:
@wezzz wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:2, topic:433210”]More info, stop putting like a big clob of text in the intro, make the topic better, and so…

Good luck![/quote]

CARE.
I’m in btw (Avocadoftw@hotmail.com) Add me aswell to join our development team. We have made progress so far and we have a great motivation when developing this server. We are looking for MATURE PEOPLE. Don’t care about the age, just act a bit more mature than most 13 year olds lmao…

item.title: Project Equinox (Needs A Development Team)
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

[center][center][center][center][/center]
I am starting a project I am calling it Project Equinox, this is based of Sanity’s release of Project insanity so it is practically blank I plan on making it one of the best servers to be released or played, but I know I can’t do it alone, so I need a team you can contact me here:
Windows Live Messenger: estamiezzii@hotmail.com
Skype: joseph.wilkins4
[center][size=14pt]Got all the spots for team except a GFX designer.[/size][/center][/s]
[center][size=12pt]Switched Client Still PI though…[/size][/center]
[center][size=10pt]Updates[/size][/center]

9gviip.png800×200

UPDATES as of: 2/16/12
Added Gnome agility
Some commands it had only 3
Fixed T1 errors
Fixed some items that required 10defence but only needed 1
Adding correct teleports for ancient spellbook and modern
Finished Barb Agility
Moved home to varrock
Made an NPC that takes you around the server.

UPDATES as of 12:20pm 2/17/12
Enabled Firemaking
Rewrote woodcutting

Fixed teleporting Npc
Fixed edgeville trapdoor and ladder
Added and spawned shops and npc’s
Started Tutorial Island base.
Wrote dialogues for the survival expert.
Added a reward for finishing survival expert.
Started a bread making base.
Finished bread making.
Added The correct emotes when cooking on a range.

Added cooking on a fire for beef:L
Added Master Chef to tutorial island.
Added Combat Instructor to Tutorial Island.
Added Mining Instructor to Tutorial Island.

[center][size=24pt]Here’ what’s already in[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]Basic Range
Basic Melee
Basic Magic
Auto casting
Perfect Switching7
[/center]
[size=18pt][center]Skills[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]All trees Work
Stumps[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]Get fish[/center]
[center]Correct anims[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]Gnome agility[/center]
[center]Barbarian Agility[/center]
[center]Ape atoll agility[/center]
[center]Werewolf agility[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]Stall thieving[/center]
[center]Npc Thieving[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]Burying bones[/center]
[center]Use on altar[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]Normal Spell book[/center]
[center]Ancient Spell book[/center]
[center]Lunar Spell book[/center]
[center]Auto casting[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]Tinderbox with logs[/center]
[center]Clipped[/center]
[center]Fire Shows.[/center]

[font=impact][size=18pt]Finished a working tutorial island :D[/size][/font][/center][/center]

Read full topic
